response.original_title: Me ti gynaika tou filou mou
response.overview: And in this work, the author focuses on extramarital and illicit relationships through stereotyped characters, grotesque faces, clownish facial expressions, mimes, grimaces, slurs, crude expressions, lewd gestures and actions. Dissatisfied spouses seek revenge and resort to infidelity. Two pairs of friends, Bayate and Perle, unashamedly cuckold each other creating forbidden bonds while in their courtships unwitting third parties get involved who, despite their innocence, are asked to suffer the consequences of an incredible misunderstanding set up by a...
response.title: Me ti gynaika tou filou mou
